conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 6-1 and 6-3;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient
docname: CASE OF LEONID LAZARENKO v. UKRAINE
issue: Article 45 of the Code of Criminal Procedure (“the CCP”)
judges: Ganna Yudkivska;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
